name: Dice Detective
description:
Dice detective is a game about skill and luck, where the main mechanic is rolling. Every time you roll, your dice also rolls, changing the gun that you have for better or for worse, and also you recharge your bullets.

CONTROLS:

wasd for moving

Left click for shooting

Right click for rolling
